name: Alpha-GPC
description: Most bioavailable choline source, crossing the blood-brain barrier efficiently. Supports acetylcholine synthesis, cognitive function, and growth hormone release. Used clinically in Europe for cognitive decline and as a nootropic in the biohacking community.

dosage.notes: Take in morning or pre-workout. 600mg pre-exercise may boost GH. Pharmaceutical grade (Gliatilin) used in Europe for dementia. Hygroscopic â€” keep dry.

keyFindings: Improved cognitive function in Alzheimer patients in multiple Italian trials
Acute 600mg dose increased growth hormone secretion
Superior choline delivery to brain compared to choline bitartrate or CDP-choline
